nodes.description: Timothy McVeigh于1995年4月22日被逮捕，当时仍涉嫌俄克拉荷马城爆炸案
NBC Nightly News报道了Timothy McVeigh的逮捕情况
nodes.support_text: NBC Nightly News reports on the apprehension of Timothy McVeigh

nodes.description: 发布《McVeigh Tapes: Confessions of an American Terrorist》纪录片
nodes.support_text: Hear his never-before chilling confession, on The McVeigh Tapes: Confessions of an American Terrorist

edges.support_text: NBC Nightly News reports on the apprehension of Timothy McVeigh
